lead_paragraph: Justine Henin, a shy, petite Belgian with a fierce desire to win, and big-serving Russian Marat Safin were honored as the new inductees into the International Tennis Hall of Fame in Newport, Rhode Island on Saturday.
snippet: Justine Henin, a shy, petite Belgian with a fierce desire to win, and big-serving Russian Marat Safin were honored as the new inductees into the International Tennis Hall of Fame in Newport, Rhode Island on Saturday....

headline.main: Henin, Safin Ushered Into International Tennis Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: Henin, Safin Ushered Into International Tennis Hall of Fame
